original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.34. Ācayagāmittika, Hetuduka🔽Ācayagāmiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naācayagāmī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  ācaya gāmittika  ācaya gāmim hetum dhammam paṭicca na ācaya gāmī na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa
translated: The Triad-Couplet Conditional Relations🔽With an outcome as condition, a non-outcome, not having a cause, is born. (In brief.) With a cause, thirteen. With an object, nine. … With a nutriment, nine. … With a faculty, nine. … With a path, nine. … With an outcome, thirteen.

original: Ācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapacayagāmī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: ācaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca na apacaya gāmī na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava
translated: With a non-outcome, not having a cause, a non-outcome, not having a cause, is born. (In brief.) With a cause, nine. … With an object, nine. … With a nutriment, nine. … With a faculty, nine. … With a path, nine. … With an outcome, nine.
